code: export var commaNumber=function commaNumber(num){return num.toString().replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g,",").replace(/[^0-9^,^\.]+/g,'');};export var shortNum=function shortNum(donuts){var val=NaN;if(donuts>0)donuts=Math.floor(donuts);if(donuts<100000)val=commaNumber(donuts);else if(donuts<1000000)val=Math.floor(donuts/1000)+'K';else val=Math.floor(donuts/100000)/10+'M';return Number.isNaN(val)?'0':val;};
